file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 31-31-03-04 - TRIAXIAL ACCELEROMETER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TRIAXIAL ACCELEROMETER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the FDR triaxial accelerometer. B. The FDR triaxial accelerometer is installed in the wing stub with access at the left main landing gear wheelwell. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FDR TRIAXIAL ACCELEROMETER - RE- ALL 31-31-03-000-801-A MOVAL FDR TRIAXIAL ACCELEROMETER - IN- ALL 31-31-03-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 31-31-03 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-31-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FDR TRIAXIAL ACCELEROMETER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the FDR triaxial accelerometer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 155 155MZ Left main landing gear wheelwell D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing stub I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the FDR circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Remove access panel 155MZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (1) from the triaxial accelerometer (2). (2) Loosen the bolts (4) and nuts (6) which attach the triaxial accelerometer (2) to the support (5). (3) Remove the triaxial accelerometer (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-31-03 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL FDR Triaxial Accelerometer - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 155 DET. A B 4. BOLT 3. WASHER 2. FDR TRIAXIAL ACCELEROMETER 5. SUPPORT 6. NUT 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM310077.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-31-03 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-31-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FDR TRIAXIAL ACCELEROMETER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the FDR triaxial accelerometer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 31-31-00-700-801-A/500 FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - FUNCTIONAL TEST AMM TASK 31-31-00-700-804-A/500 FLIGHT DATA RECORDER - FUNCTIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 155 155MZ Left main landing gear wheelwell D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing stub I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the triaxial accelerometer (2) in its installation position. (2) Install and tighten the bolts (4) and nuts (6) which attach the triaxial accelerometer (2) to the support (5). (3) Connect the electrical connector (1) to the triaxial accelerometer (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 31-31-03 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the FDR circuit breaker and close it. (2) Do the flight data recorder functional test (FDR triaxial accelerometer parameters only) ( AMM TASK 31-31-00-700-801-A/500) or ( AMM TASK 31-31-00-700-804-A/500), as applicable. (3) Install access panel 155MZ (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 31-31-03 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
